name: Extreme Furious Driving Simulator - Trucks vs Muscles
name_original: Extreme Furious Driving Simulator - Trucks vs Muscles
description:
Extreme Furious Driving Simulator is a driving and parking game featured with realistic vehicle physics and HD graphics. There are 1 sports car and 2 trucks: the American Muscle Mustang GT Coupe, Ford F150 and Chevrolet Silverado.
You can drive GT Coupe from the beginning of the game and test your skills against the challenging levels by reaching your target in time. Other cars can be unlocked by picking up stars scattered across all levels. Sprint in the beautiful environment to chase your own high score! More vehicles and levels will be coming soon!

Features

Realistic Vehicle Physics
Multiple playable vehicles
20 challenging levels
HD graphics with 3 different quality levels
Beautiful city parking lot environment

So don't be a drudge and let’s get started with some vroom vroom!
